item.description:
If you enjoy swing dancing, Dance2Swing's "Swingin Sundays" is worth the drive from anywhere! The weekly dance attracts singles and couples from all over New England and everyone dances with everyone. Come with or without a partner!

”Social Swing Dancing is a great way to mingle with new people, get into shape, have a blast, meet cool people and learn to Swing Dance. There's a Group Swing Dance Lesson each week before the dance begins so beginners can learn the simple steps, get to know everyone and then dance all night to terrific Live Bands

Leominster Elks, 134 North Main St. Leominster MA 01453 6:30pm ~ Beginner Swing Dance Lesson

7:30pm ~ Swing Dance to Live Bands

Admission ~ $12 at the door

Directions Leominster Lodge of Elks 134 North Main Street, (Route 12), Leominster, MA From Route 2, either West or East, take Exit 31A. That will put you on North Main Street which is Route 12 going South. Go through 2 sets of lights. After the 2nd set of lights you'll see The Leominster Hospital on your right. Stay to the left at the fork of the road. You'll come to your 3rd set of lights, go through the light staying on Route 12 South. The Elks will be on your right hand side. It's a white building, set off the road. From 495 N or S, Take Exit 29B to Route 2 West and follow directions above. From Worcester: I-190 North and merge onto Route 2 West. Follow directions above.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Dance2Swing/Lessons & Dancing to a Live Band
